dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage Your AutoFit AI Features and Widgets

setup.title: Setup Guide
setup.info: Follow this setup guide to activate and configure the Fitment widgets.
setup.setup1desc: To Start Using AI-YMM APP, first activate in your Shopify Admin. Activation is required for all the features. Go to theme customization and under the app embeded toggle the AI-YMM APP to activate.
setup.setup2desc: Turn on all required widgets in the app settings.
setup.setup3desc: Add your store's data to complete the setup and get the app fully functional.

card1.title: Chatbot with AI Assistant
card1.description: Instantly find the right auto parts with our AI assistant. Chat-powered, smart, and always ready to help get accurate recommendations, fast!

card2.title: Fitment Widget
card2.description: Easily find parts that fit your vehicle with our Year, Make, Model dropdown filter — precise, fast, and user-friendly.

card3.title: Verify Fitment Widget
card3.description: Quickly verify if a part fits your selected vehicle — smart, accurate, and always up-to-date.

card4.title: Fitment Table
card4.description: View detailed compatibility info by Year, Make, Model, and more — ensure perfect part fitment at a glance.

support.title: Support and feedback
support.description: Schedule a free onboarding call with our Merchant Support team, or chat with us now, to get set up.

card1.title: Privacy Policy
card1.description: Read how we handle your customer data in our privacy policy.

card2.title: Feature Request
card2.description: Send us your ideas to improve the app and add functionality.
